python 3.7
--Author-- JLor

TicTacToe game where agents play against each other and make random moves

To play the game in the command line navigate to the folder where files are saved and  type:

python play_game.py -n 100


To play 100 games
(substitute 100 for any other number of games)

Output: the statistic on how many games won by 'x',  'o' or draw.
